about_the_game:
Get Ready to Shoot to the Beat In Beatshooter!


Strap in, load up, and get ready to blast your way through a psychedelic roller coaster of rhythm and mayhem in BeatShooter - the funkiest rhythm shooter this side of the metaverse!

Ride the Rails, Shoot the Beats

Hop aboard the groove train for a trip down Melody Lane. Your tracks are laid by the beat, your ammo is unlimited, and your targets are all the notes the world's funkiest DJs can throw at you. Shoot, dodge, and punch your ticket to the top of the leaderboards. This is one music festival where the crowds shoot back!

Endless Replay Value

No two gigs are the same in BeatShooter. An ever-expanding catalog of tracks means there's always a fresh challenge. Think you've mastered a song? Crank up the difficulty and see if you can keep up with our most blistering beats. Whether you're a fresh-faced newbie or a seasoned rhythm veteran, BeatShooter's got a groove with your name on it.

Get Noticed On the Virtual Stage

In BeatShooter, every player's a performer. Nail those combos, crush those high scores, and rock the leaderboards. The better you shoot, the bigger your fan base grows. Think you've got what it takes to be the next big thing? Prove it on the virtual stage!

the Ultimate Test Of Rhythm and Reflexes

BeatShooter is easy to learn but challenging to master. Simple mechanics conceal layers of depth that will keep you coming back for one more song, one more run, one more shot at the top spot. This is a rhythm game that demands as much from your trigger finger as it does from your sense of timing. Think you've got the chops? Let's see what you've got!

Get BeatShooter Now and Let the Music Move You... to Shoot!

Don't miss your chance to experience the freshest blend of music and mayhem to hit the scene. Get BeatShooter now and see if you can shoot your way to the top of the charts!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+ (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 4GB / AMD Radeon R9 290 4GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Shoot to the beat in this fast-paced rhythm rail shooter. Blast your way through a psychedelic musical universe, racking up combos and climbing the leaderboards. Easy to learn, challenging to master, with an ever-expanding track list that ensures the beat never stops.
